revised report on the algorithmic language algol 60 the report gives a complete defining description of international algorithmic language this is suitable for expressing large class numerical processes in form sufficiently concise direct automatic translation into programmed computers cacm january 1963 nuar p ca630117 es march 17 1982 10 am 1781 4 3184 1828 1854 1877 1960 2150 2228 2256 2317 2319 2377 2342 2376 2379 2424 2482 2618 2632 2704 2723 2738 2740 2741 2867 949 5 989 1086 1132 1198 1234 1263 1265 1270 1323 1358 1379 1380 1453 1464 1484 1491 1498 1613 1614 1749 1825 1860 2083 2178 2179 2252 2325 2341 2546 2645 2652 2684 2842 2929 2934 557 3069 669 679 691 761 1 6 823 123 145 196 919 944 947 987 988 990 1007 1046 1131 1134 1137 1139 1140 1149 1215 1223 1303 1366 1389 1421 1460 1462 1463 1467 1468 1466 1477 1496 1531 1535 1565 1601 1602 1626 1641 1785 1786 1787 1788 205 210 224 249 267 288 316 321 378 381 385 398 2015 2059 2060 2110 11 2126 2127 2148 2155 2192 21 400 402 404 407 410 437 463 464 483 3188 584 600 631 635 680 729 731 763 799
